title: Thief: The Black Parade Mod Spotlight
description:
Thief the Black Parade is a fan made expansion for The Dark Project nearly a decade in the making, adding ten massive missions along with a lot of surprising context for Thief 2 and Deadly Shadows. I believe it's canon. 
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
00:00 - Intro
00:40 - Mod Background
01:49 - Getting the Black Parade
02:15 - Mod Premise
03:20 - The Black Parade
11:00 - Conclusion
11:30 - Credits
12:34 - Bed Time Denied
